name: Espresso Martini
decription: espresso shots for Espresso Martinis in glass bottleuse 3cl for 1 drink

name: Negroni
decription: mix in Beefeater bottle [campari+martini+gin](pour 9cl for 1 drink in mixer, then add 3 dashes of orange bitters, mix, strain in glass w/ big ice, and add orange peel

name: Old Fashioned
decription: mix in Redemption bottle [Rye+angostura+syrup] (pour 9cl for 1 drink in glass w/ big ice, add 4 drops of chocolate bitters, mix, and add orange peel and cherry)
